channel.title: GIS on Dominic Royé
channel.description: Recent content in GIS on Dominic Royé

item.title: Climate animation of maximum temperatures
item.description: In the field of data visualization, the animation of spatial data in its temporal dimension can show fascinating changes and patterns. As a result of one of the last publications in the social networks that I have made, I was asked to make a post about how I created it. Well, here we go to start with an example of data from mainland Spain. You can find more animations in the graphics section of my blog.

item.title: Introducción a los SIG con R
